snippet: McCandlish Phillips, a former Times reporter who died on Tuesday, did not have fond memories of his work on the police beat in Brooklyn in the 1950s, says a reporter who talked with him a few years ago.
abstract: McCandlish Phillips, a former Times reporter who died on Tuesday, did not have fond memories of his work on the police beat in Brooklyn in the 1950s, says a reporter who talked with him a few years ago.

headline.main: With Reporter's Death, Recalling the Days Before He Stood Out
